nearby_places: Jaigarh Fort (1 km by walk), Srijagat Siromaniji Temple (500m), Panna Meena ka Kund (1 km) & Jama Masjid / Akbari Mosque - Amer (1 km) are sitauted near Amer Fort and can be visited together.
title: Amer Fort / Amber Fort

title: City Palace / Sawai Man Singh II Museum

nearby_places: This is UNESCO World Heritage Site
title: Jantar Mantar
